events.eventDescription: Liketsahalo tsena li hlophisitsoe ke lik'hamphani tse fapaneng, sechaba, le ba bang ba nang le thahasello.

hero.title: Hlahloba Batho le Liketsahalo Tsa Bosiu
hero.subtitle: Sheba meputso e etselitsoeng ho thusa metsoalle ea rona e emelang batho.
hero.supportSubtitle: Ka tšehetso ea tlhaho le baahloli ba sechaba le mebuso.

footer.address: 143 Tsela Ya Bochabela, Sandown, Sandton, Gauteng, Afrika Borwa

services.title: Seo U ka se Etsang le Sechaba
services.subtitle: Bakeng sa mosebetsi, mebuso, le likamano.

steps.title: Sechaba
steps.description: Kopanya le batho ba sechaba, theha lits'ebeletso tsa bona, 'me u li hlahise.

steps.title: Liketsahalo tsa Sechaba
steps.description: Se ke oa fetoa ke liketsahalo tsa sechaba.

steps.title: Mesebetsi le Likopano
steps.description: Li-NGO tsa rona li thusa ka boiphihlelo ho tsoela pele, le mesebetsi ea matsoho.

steps.title: Forum
steps.description: Batho ba bala liforamo le mabitso a ho buisana ka litaba tsa bophelo.

subscribe.title: Ngolisa ho Lethathamo la Rona
subscribe.description: Fumana tsebiso ea liketsahalo, mesebetsi, le lihlooho tse ling ho tsoa ho baqolotsi le liforamo.

faq.title: Lipotso Tse Atisang ho Botsoa
faq.subtitle: Haeba u sa fumane karabo, ikopanye le tšehetso ea sechaba.

questions.question: Sisonke AI E Etsa'ng Sechaba?
questions.answer: Chelete e bokelloa ka likopo tsa sechaba tse thusang batho ho etsa mesebetsi.

questions.question: Sisonke E Hlahisa'ng Sechaba?
questions.answer: Sechaba sena se tšehetsa boithuto le lintlha tse thutoang ka mokhoa o hlophisitsoeng.

questions.question: Na Le Sebetsa le Sechaba sa Rona?
questions.answer: Ee, lik'hamphani tse thusang sechaba li tšehetsoa.

questions.question: Na Mesebetsi ea Sechaba e Laetsoe?
questions.answer: Ee, mesebetsi eo e lokiselitsoe ho lumellana le litlhoko.

questions.question: Na Sechaba se Theha Boitsebiso?
questions.answer: Ee, sechaba se theha boitsebiso bo thusang boits'oaro ba sechaba.

blogs.title: Liketsahalo Tse Buang ka Mesebetsi
blogs.subtitle: Fumana likeletso mabapi le mesebetsi le mebuso.

posts.title: Bohlokoa ba Mosebetsi le Sepheo
posts.description: Ho ba le sepheo se hlakileng ke mokhoa oa ho tsoela pele ho theha mosebetsi. Likopano tsena...

posts.title: Liketsahalo tsa ho Thabisa Bana
posts.description: Bana ba nang le boiphihlelo mosebetsing ba khona ho tsoela pele ka mosebetsi o matla...

posts.title: Lintho Tse Sa Lokelang ho Buoa Mosebetsing
posts.description: Mosebetsi o hlophisitsoe ho ts'oaroe hantle ka nako ea bohlokoa...
